<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.1</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.apps" name="System Applications Core" version="1.0.1" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" licensable="true" type="application"> <description>Core applications development.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.snc.apps_picker"/> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Apps" class="com.snc.apps.api.Apps"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UninstallApplicationInfo" class="com.snc.apps.UninstallApplicationInfo"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TableEditor" class="com.snc.apps.api.TableEditor"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TableFieldUpdater" class="com.snc.apps.api.TableFieldUpdater"/> <extension point="com.glide.db.cascade.delete.listener" name="CascadeFromDeleteVersionListener" class="com.glideapp.version.CascadeFromDeleteVersionListener"/> <extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="AssignableByRoleAccessHandler" class="com.glide.sys.security.AssignableByRoleAccessHandler" order="9000"/> <extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="ScopedAdministrationAccessHandler" class="com.glide.sys.security.ScopedAdministrationAccessHandler" order="9100"/>
<extension point="com.glide.script.access.handler" name="HardcodedAccessHandler" class="com.glide.sys.security.accesshandler.hardcoded.HardcodedAccessHandler" order="3"/>
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Core applications development.</description> <has_demo_data>false</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.snc.apps</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>System Applications Core</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.apps/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.apps_picker</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.apps</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type>application</type> <version>1.0.1</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
